sections.heading: Repealed.Section 7-19B-2 - Repealed
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1993, ch. 346, § 12B repealed 7-19B-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1990, ch. 99, § 49, relating to short title of the Municipal Environmental Services Gross Receipts Tax Act, effective July 1, 1993. For provisions of former section,seethe 1992 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.

sections.heading: Repealed.

sections.heading: Recompiled.
sections.text: Recompilations.— Laws 1993, ch. 346, § 10 recompiled former 7-19B-3 NMSA 1978 as enacted by Laws 1990, ch. 99, § 51, relating to authority to impose tax, as 7-19D-10 NMSA 1978, effective July 1, 1993.
